html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04692022-05-10,  HC,  ,  , 
ActPest Control Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Ultraviolet Radiation-emitting Devices and Ozone-generating Devices)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (ULTRAVIOLET RADIATION-EMITTING DEVICES AND OZONE-GENERATING DEVICES) in order to (1) prescribe certain ultra-violet (UV) and ozone-generating devices as pest control products; (2) add definitions for UV and ozone-generating devices; (3) clarify the scope of products that are subject to the amendments; (4) authorize the manufacture for export of certain devices; (5) establish the criteria for authorization for certain UV devices; (6) clarify which UV components may be replaced in authorized UV devices; (7) clarify which UV components do not require registration; and (8) make technical amendments that are administrative in nature.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0099 Publication Date: 2022-05-25
AttachmentsAttachment
